Charts.TicketsAttributionDay: Allocation of day tickets by operator
Charts.TicketsAttributionMonth: Allocation of monthly tickets by operator
Charts.TicketsAttributionYear: Allocation of tickets for the year by operator
Charts.TiketsTypesDay: Type of tickets created during the day
Charts.TiketsTypesMonth: Type of tickets created during the month
Charts.TiketsTypesYear: Type of tickets created during the year
Charts.PasDeDonneesBarChart: No data available yet regarding ticket distribution
Charts.PasDeDonneesPieChart: No data available yet regarding the distribution of ticket types

NbTicketMois.NbTicketsCreesMois: Total number of tickets created this month
NbTicketMois.NbTicketsResolusMois: Total number of tickets resolved this month

NbTicketAnnee.NbTicketsCreesAnnee: Total number of tickets created this year
NbTicketAnnee.NbTicketsResolusAnnee: Total number of tickets resolved this year

TicketCount.NbTicketsCreesJour: Number of new tickets created during the day
TicketCount.NbTicketsResolusJour: Number of tickets resolved during the day
TicketCount.TitleTableau: Table of tickets created during the day

Credits.CreditTxt: This application was developed by Mr. Tom DUBOIS as part of an internship at SDIS 41, aiming to validate his year of University Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science.
Credits.ObjectifTxt: This project was developed to provide the SIC service with an application capable of gathering performance indicators regarding their Clarilog ticketing system, an auto-completion system for the SIC monthly report, as well as an alert system for important emails.
Credits.ContactTxt: For any request for improvement, correction, or evolution of this application, please contact its creator:
Credits.FinalTxt: A big thank you to SDIS 41 for the warm welcome and the resources made available during this project.

Rapport.HowToGetCSV: How to retrieve the different CSV files?
Rapport.Etape1: 1. On Centreon, go to the ‟Report” tab, ‟Availability”, then ‟Host Groups”
Rapport.Etape3: 3. Select the desired date range and click ‟Apply period”
Rapport.Etape4: 4. Download the report in CSV format by clicking on the CSV icon
Rapport.TooltipTelephonie: The time indicated will be inserted in the comment section
